name: Last Survivor (amh271999)
description:
Last Survivor is a first person survival shooter game that involves a player who is trapped in a countryside occupied with zombies. The objective is to kill many zombies as possible in order to set a new score.

Weapons are provided such as revolver and assault rifle to help the player defend from the vicious attacks from zombies. Horror genre is connected to this game as zombies have a terrifying appearance who are capable of chasing and attacking the player at disturbing manner.

The game has been planned and developed for couple of months with Unity engine, with this being the final release.

Controls:
  • Movement - WASD or arrow keys 
  • Jump - Space 
  • Crouch - C
  • Player rotation - Escape key + mouse
  • Change weapons - 1 & 2
  • Shoot - E
  • Pause - P

React fast, be safe and enjoy the game!

Developed by: Mohammad Hussain
